languages.text: Губернатор Амберворлда поведал Вольному Торговцу о небесной колеснице некоего Короля Искажений — местного бога, что изменяет тела людей. Похоже, колесницей называют неизвестную аномалию, образовавшуюся в системе.

traits.locale_text: Губернатор Амберворлда поведал вам о небесной колеснице некоего Короля Изменений — местного бога, что искажает тела людей. Похоже, колесницей называют неизвестную аномалию, образовавшуюся в системе.

languages.text: The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Distortion — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.
languages.original_text: Губернатор Амберворлда поведал Вольному Торговцу о небесной колеснице некоего Короля Искажений — местного бога, что изменяет тела людей. Похоже, колесницей называют неизвестную аномалию, образовавшуюся в системе.

traits.locale_text: The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Change — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Change — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Change — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Distortion — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

languages.text: 琥珀世界的总督提到过，说神圣的战车会在天空中出现。战车的主人叫做扭曲之王，是一位当地的神明，正是他扭曲了人们的身体。看起来，这辆“战车”是这个星系中的某种异常现象。
languages.original_text: The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Distortion — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

traits.locale_text: 琥珀世界的总督提到过，说神圣的战车会在天空中出现。战车的主人叫做扭曲之王，是一位当地的神明，正是他扭曲了人们的身体。看起来，这辆“战车”是这个星系中的某种异常现象。

languages.text: アンバーワールドの総督は、人の体を変形させる地神であるディストーションの王の天の戦車について言及した。どうやらこの「戦車」とは、星系に発生する何らかの異常のようだ。
languages.original_text: The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Distortion — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

traits.locale_text: アンバーワールドの総督は、人の体を変形させる地神であるディストーションの王の天の戦車について言及した。どうやらこの「戦車」とは、星系に発生する何らかの異常のようだ。

languages.text: El gobernador de Ámbar ha hablado del carro celestial de un cierto rey de la Distorsión, un dios local que deforma los cuerpos de la gente. Parece que este «carro» es una anomalía que se manifiesta en el sistema.
languages.original_text: The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Distortion — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

traits.locale_text: El gobernador de Ámbar ha hablado del carro celestial de un cierto rey de la Distorsión, un dios local que deforma los cuerpos de la gente. Parece que este «carro» es una anomalía que se manifiesta en el sistema.

languages.text: Der Gouverneur von Amberworld erwähnte den himmlischen Streitwagen des "Königs der Entstellung" ... einem örtlichen Gott, der die Körper der Leute deformiert. Offenbar ist dieser "Streitwagen" eine im System manifestierte Anomalie.
languages.original_text: The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Distortion — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

traits.locale_text: Der Gouverneur von Amberworld erwähnte den himmlischen Streitwagen des "Königs der Entstellung" ... einem örtlichen Gott, der die Körper der Leute deformiert. Offenbar ist dieser "Streitwagen" eine im System manifestierte Anomalie.

languages.text: Le gouverneur d'Ambremonde a parlé du char céleste d'un certain Roi de la Distorsion, un dieu local qui déforme les corps des gens. Il semblerait que ce « char » soit une sorte d'anomalie se manifestant dans le système.
languages.original_text: The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Distortion — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

traits.locale_text: Le gouverneur du l'Ambre-Monde a parlé du char céleste d'un certain Roi de la Distorsion, un dieu local qui déforme les corps des gens. Il semblerait que ce « char » soit une sorte d'anomalie se manifestant dans le système.

languages.text: Kehribardünya valisi; Bozunum Kralı dediği, insanların bedenlerini deforme eden yerel bir tanrının semavi savaş arabasından bahsetti. Bu "savaş arabası", sistemde meydana gelen bir çeşit anomali gibi duruyor.
languages.original_text: The governor of Amberworld has spoken of a heavenly chariot of a certain King of Distortion — a local god who deforms the bodies of the people. It seems this "chariot" is some kind of anomaly manifesting in the system.

traits.locale_text: Kehribardünya'nın valisi, Bozulum Kralı dediği, insanların bedenlerini deforme eden yerel bir tanrının semavi savaş arabasından bahsetti. Bu "savaş arabası", sistemde meydana gelen bir çeşit anomali gibi duruyor.
